title: Fire drill!
creator_credit: Stephen Wallen and Alfred Higgins Productions
brief_description: Clearly outlines the procedure to be followed in a school should a fire break out. Indicates the need for alternative exit routes; what to do if all exit routes are blocked; and how to minimise the effects of smoke inhalation. Suitable for secondary and tertiary levels.
